title: Mutualismo
body: In the article 'Associado 4 de Setembro de 1862' (I-97), a brief account was given about the earliest efforts made to establish mutualist principles among us, which have slowly borne their esteemed fruits, with the exception of the association mentioned, which is an admirable example attesting to the beneficial action of these principles. On this subject, it is worth reading an extensive article published in the issue of *Trabalho e União* on September 1, 1917. Also, read the booklet 'Mutualismo' authored by Dr. Álvaro Reis Gomes.

1862: Establishment of the Associado 4 de Setembro association
